subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Dec 4, 2007, at 1:21 AM, judy_in_hollywood wrote:

>
>  So, Ann, You think it's OK for Chris to say all the BS he's  
> claiming against Us & Frank?
>

No, and I believe every post I have made makes that abundantly clear.  
That doesn't mean that I am pro needless civil suits that instead  
should be settled with conversations between parties involved,of  
which you and I are not included.

> ? As a Legal Secretary/assistant & "Independent" Paranormal  
> Investigator, etc. I disagree with you, but THAT's OK!
>
You're right, it is okay for us to disagree.
> =Judy= P.S.When you get your box, you can start your bussiness and  
> make money, too, like Chris!! Perhaps that's what's needed . . .  
> competition!
>

I've never made a dime off my paranormal ability and I never will.

Thanks for playing,

Ann
